boardgame.name: Greed Incorporated
boardgame.description: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Twenty million, twenty-one million, twenty-two million... hey! Where_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s the rest of my bonus?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; The CEO_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s voice does not match his elegant, tailor-made suit. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;But sir..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; the accountant protests, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;you have bankrupted this company. Your employees have lost their pensions. Surely you can..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Stop whining,_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; the CEO interrupts him. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Clearly you don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;t understand business at all. How am I supposed to pay for adequate transportation if I do not get my bonus? Make sure you transfer the money, today!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; He slams the door of his white limousine and drives off, heading for a new challenge._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Greed, Incorporated is a game of corporate malversations and greedy executives. You run one or more companies and make their accounting books look as good as possible using every trick that good old honest businessmen ever invented. And some more. Just make sure to leave the company, cashing your exit bonus, before the company crashes and the credit crunch commences._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Contents:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Rulebook_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Mounted game board_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;17 Black wooden cubes to keep track of prices_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;11 Yellow wooden cubes to keep track of price trends_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;6 Red wooden boot markers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;10 Black wooden dollar signs_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1 Green wooden dollar starting player token_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;5 Player aids_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;5 Sets of 12 player manager tokens each_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;10 Company placards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;10 Company cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;40 Asset cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;18 Status symbol cards - 9 each in gold and silver_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;99 Goods cards, depicting 11 different goods_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1 pile of playing money_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

I see this as a business game for our times: whoever has the most toys, wins! However, the Splotter team have built a model of real business underneath this. This price is for UK/EU purchasers (and includes VAT) - the tax-free price for those outside the EU is £41.67. I charge shipping at cost and I can offer several options (or ask me to get a price from a courier). To UK addresses: Second class (3 working days) £5.60 First class (1 working day) £6.85 MyHermes (3 working days, tracked) £4.20 Parcelforce express48 (2 working days, tracked) £11.96 To other EU countries: Air mail (1 week) £10.75 To North American addresses: Surface mail (up to 6 weeks) £11.25 Air Mail (1 week) £18.00 Note that the purchaser is responsible for any import duties or taxes in their country.
